name: ShortSqueeze
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: short squeeze
des: Welcome to the Short Squeeze, an Alexa skill to help identify the stocks that have the highest short interest as a percentage of float (SIPF). In other words, the most shorted stocks on Wall Street. You can ask me for what stock to Short Squeeze next! This app is purely for fun and should not be taken as financial advice.
